original_text: Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together and running over, will be poured into your lap. For with the measure you use, it will be measured to you.”
korean_text: 주라 그리하면 너희에게 줄 것이니 곧 후히 되어 누르고 흔들어 넘치도록 하여 너희에게 안겨 주리라 너희가 헤아리는 그 헤아림으로 너희도 헤아림을 도로 받을 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Give, and it will be given to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 주라, 그러면 너희에게 받을 것이 있으리니

sentences.original_text: will be poured into your lap.
For with the measure you use,
it will be measured to you.
